trans-unit.source: Acts as a container to a group of activities that is executed when the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> starts running.
trans-unit.target: Fungerar som en behållare till en grupp av aktiviteter som utförs när den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> börjar köras.
Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateInitializationActivity acts as a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> to all activities it contains.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]StateInitializationActivity fungerar som en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>för alla aktiviteter den innehåller.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> classes may be included in the StateInitializationActivity.

If a StateInitializationActivity exists in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, the StateInitializationActivity is the first activity that gets executed when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts executing.
trans-unit.target: Om en StateInitializationActivity finns i en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, StateInitializationActivity är den första aktiviteten som får köras när den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>startar körning.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In some ways the StateInitializationActivity is like an `OnEnterState` handler.
trans-unit.target: På vissa sätt är StateInitializationActivity som en `OnEnterState` hanterare.

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity is not a mandatory activity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.
trans-unit.target: StateInitializationActivity är inte en obligatorisk aktivitet i <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the StateInitializationActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: StateInitializationActivity är en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, vilket innebär att StateInitializationActivity kan innehålla andra aktiviteter.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity cannot contain any activity that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> interface, which includes all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> activities and the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: StateInitializationActivity får inte innehålla någon aktivitet som implementerar det <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>-gränssnittet, som innehåller alla <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>aktiviteter och <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>aktivitet.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: A StateInitializationActivity is executed in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, a non-blocking manner that makes the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> ready to receive events.
trans-unit.target: En StateInitializationActivity utförs i den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, ett icke-blockerande sätt som gör det <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>redo att ta emot händelser.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateInitializationActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity> activity, so that it can model a state machine where transitions occur from state to state without receiving any event.
trans-unit.target: StateInitializationActivity kan innehålla en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>aktivitet, så att den kan modellen en tillståndsdator där övergångar inträffa från tillstånd till läget utan att få en händelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity>

trans-unit.source: In that sense the state machine behaves like a sequential workflow.
trans-unit.target: I den meningen fungerar tillståndsdatorn som ett sekventiellt arbetsflöde.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity"> </xref> klassen med namnet på aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
